\usepackage{url}

\usepackage[ngerman]{babel}

% syntax command: \newcommand{\customcommand}[1]{\somecommand{#1}} -> \customcommand{einWort}
% syntax theorem: ({}[take external numbering]{})
\newtheorem{abb}{Abb.}
% syntax enviroment: \newenviroment{Name}[Zahl][Vorbelegung]{Startbefehl}{Endbefehl}; ev. + let
\begin{document}
